definition: to fulfill one's duty/to work without asking for reward
to use up/to exhaust/to end/to finish/to the utmost/exhausted/finished/to the limit (of sth)/all/entirely
to the greatest extent/(when used before a noun of location) furthest or extreme/to be within the limits of/to give priority to
justice/righteousness/meaning/foster (father etc)/adopted/artificial (tooth, limb etc)/relationship/friendship
surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy
affair/business/matter/to be engaged in/to attend to/by all means

sentences.english: Never desert a group to which you owe your support.
sentences.chinese: 不要背弃自己必须尽义务支持的团体。

sentences.english: We must perform our duty to our parents.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须对我们的父母尽义务。

sentences.english: I don't want him to marry me out of obligation.
sentences.chinese: 我不想让他为了尽义务而跟我结婚。

sentences.english: Party B agrees that the expiration of this license shall not discharge party B from its obligation.
sentences.chinese: 乙方同意在许可证到期时并不免除乙方应尽义务。

sentences.english: It is a necessary task of responsible global citizenship.
sentences.chinese: 这也是负责任的全球公民的应尽义务。

sentences.english: She's always on about doing one's duty .
sentences.chinese: 她总是滔滔不绝地谈尽义务。
这是表白爱情还是尽义务？

sentences.english: Do your duty to your country.

definition: civil obligation/a citizen's duty
(to play) one's part/one's role/one's duty/(to stay within) one's bounds/dutiful/keeping to one's role
lit. heaven's law and earth's principle (idiom); fig. right and proper/right and unalterable/a matter of course
to fulfill (one's duty etc)
vocation/duty/mission in life
to do one's filial duty
to do one's duty/to do one's bit conscientiously
guard home, defend the country (idiom); national defense
to support one's family (idiom)
to discharge one's duties/conscientious
to support/to provide support for/to maintain
to guard one's territory/to protect the country
to take responsibility/to bear responsibility/to be responsible
to look after one's aged parents and arrange proper burial after they die
to fall short of/to have a deficit/deficit/deficiency
render service to repay kindness
